attributes.action: Not raise the legal age to drive to 18 in this country...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many 17 year olds can be wreckless and irresponsable but how would you feel if the government suddenly took away your right to drive... it would make you angry wouldn't it as the have become so essential in everyday life... Thing is though the higher the raise the age the longer kids will be borrowing off there parents for...
